attributes.action: Remove practicals from the GCSE spec for science
attributes.additional_details: The children have missed practicals due to covid restrictions in schools they are at a disadvantage as they cannot see the practicals and the some of the current year 9 in some schools start studying the GCSE spec in year 9.
attributes.background: Remove practical's from the GCSE spec for science for pupils sitting GCSE in 2021, 2022 and 2023.
